department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Tender for a High Free Volume Twin-Screw Extruder for the National Research Council of Canada (NRC)
description: Bidding for the acquisition, delivery and installation of a High Free Volume Twin-Screw Extruder located in Boucherville, Quebec, Canada.
full_summary:
# 31026-245134 - High Free Volume Twin-Screw Extruder

## Request for Proposal (RFP) and Tender Notice

### Tender Details
* **Notice Reference Number:** 31026-245134
* **Publication Date:** March 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 20, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Location of Work:** Boucherville, Québec, Canada
* **Type of Procurement:** Request for Proposal, Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Method:** Low Price

### Tender Description

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is soliciting proposals for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of a High Free Volume Twin-Screw Extruder. All bids, including supporting documentation, shall be submitted no later than April 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Bids received after the specified date and time will be considered non-responsive.

A detailed description of the required equipment and the bid submission process can be found in Annex A.

### Contract Information

* **Contractor Agreement Duration:** 9 months (February 1, 2023 - November 1, 2023)
* **Notices to Proceed:** Following the evaluation of all bids, the contracting officer will notify the selected contractor.

### Important Dates

* **Amendment Date:** April 12, 2023
* **Original Notice Publication Date:** March 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 20, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

### Required Documentation

* **Annex A:** The specifications and instructions for submitting a bid
* **Annex B:** All laws, regulations, and policies governing this procurement

### Contractor Contact Information

* **Corine Lavoie, Contracting Officer**
* **Phone (not available)**
* **Email: [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)**

### Link to Notice

You can access the complete notice at: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15623573?extsite=MTU2MjM1NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note that substantial modifications have been made to the original text to make it more professional in style and suitable for publication in a technical writing
